PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CableCarrierSegmentTypeConduitSegment
PropertySetDef.Definition: An enclosed tubular carrier segment through which cables are pulled.\X\0D HISTORY: IFC4 - NominalLength deleted. To be handled as a quantity measure.

PropertyDef.Name: ConduitShapeType
PropertyDef.Definition: The shape of the conduit segment.

PropertyDef.Name: IsRigid
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of whether the conduit is rigid (= TRUE) or flexible (= FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal height of the segment.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal width of the object.
